text: Indian Creek is a Mennonite settlement that is also an administrative village in Orange Walk District in Belize. Its inhabitants are German-speaking so called "Russian" Mennonites. According to the 2010 census, Little Belize had a population of 903 people in 150 households.Belize Population and Housing Census - Country Report 2010 == See also == Mennonites in Belize == References == Category:Mennonitism in Belize Category:Populated places in Orange Walk District
title: Indian Creek Colony
